name: Barbarian Riftcutter
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Riftcutter: Destroy target land.
flavor_text:
"Riftcutters are suicidal anarchists, waving those lightning axes around so much that the walls are as likely to fall as their foes."
—Heruj, Selesnya initiate

name: Benevolent Ancestor
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Although the door is flimsy and the lock pathetically small, Josuri's family never fears the night outside.

name: Boros Fury-Shield
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking or blocking creature this turn. If {R} was spent to cast this spell, Boros Fury-Shield deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.

name: Boros Garrison
oracle_text:
Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped.
When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{W}.

name: Boros Recruit
oracle_text:
({R/W} can be paid with either {R} or {W}.)
First strike
flavor_text:
"Look at this goblin, once wild, untamed, and full of idiocy. The Boros have given him the skill of a soldier and focused his heart with a single cause."
—Razia

name: Boros Signet
flavor_text:
"Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."
—Agrus Kos

name: Brainspoil
oracle_text:
Destroy target creature that isn't enchanted. It can't be regenerated.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Bramble Elemental
oracle_text: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Bramble Elemental, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor_text: Ravnica is a seamless urban tapestry, each city bleeding into the next. In abandoned corners, however, nature has begun to reclaim what it once owned.

name: Caregiver
oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: "The guilds each believe its way is right, but their ways only bring blood to Ravnica's streets and tears to Ravnica's families."

name: Centaur Safeguard
oracle_text:
({G/W} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.)
When Centaur Safeguard dies, you may gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Swift, strong, and selfless, the centaurs are the shields of the Conclave.

name: Civic Wayfinder
oracle_text: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."

name: Clinging Darkness
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -4/-1.
flavor_text: There's an experience worse than blindness—it's the certainty that your vision is perfect and the horror that there's no world around you to see.

name: Coalhauler Swine
oracle_text: Whenever Coalhauler Swine is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.
flavor_text: Nothing stops industry in Ravnica—certainly not the safety of its workers.

name: Compulsive Research
oracle_text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
flavor_text: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

name: Conclave Equenaut
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
flavor_text: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.

name: Conclave's Blessing
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 for each other creature you control.

name: Consult the Necrosages
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player draws two cards.
• Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: Dimir rank and file never see nor hear their guildmaster. All orders are given through mysterious necrosages who appear from the shadows, tersely toss out a command, and then melt into the darkness.

name: Convolute
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.
flavor_text: The words came to the sorcerer's lips but refused to budge any further.

name: Courier Hawk
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: The Orzhov started using hawks as messengers in order to bypass the many toll roads and bridges that dot Ravnica. Soon the service became one of their most profitable businesses.

name: Dimir Aqueduct
oracle_text:
Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {U}{B}.

name: Dimir House Guard
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Dimir House Guard.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Dimir Infiltrator
oracle_text:
Dimir Infiltrator can't be blocked.
Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Dimir Signet
flavor_text: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.

name: Disembowel
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with mana value X.
flavor_text:
"We thought we found the victim's clothes lumped in the street. As it turned out, it *was* the victim, insides sucked out—just a sack of skin and robes."
—Agrus Kos

name: Dizzy Spell
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Dogpile
oracle_text: Dogpile deals damage to any target equal to the number of attacking creatures you control.
flavor_text: There is no shelter from this storm, its rain of fists, or the thunderous cackles of bloodlust.

name: Drake Familiar
oracle_text:
Flying
When Drake Familiar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an enchantment to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Falconry? A fine sport I suppose, if you're attracted to the frailty of birds."
—Trivaz, Izzet mage

name: Drift of Phantasms
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Dromad Purebred
oracle_text: Whenever Dromad Purebred is dealt damage, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"I have seen much from the back of my dromad, most of it terribly wrong. The more I see, the more I am convinced of the rightness of my path."
—Heruj, Selesnya initiate

name: Dryad's Caress
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. If {W} was spent to cast this spell, untap all creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"I awoke to the face of beauty, my body fully healed. In that moment I knew my destiny was the Conclave's to shape."
—Rogad, Selesnya initiate

name: Elves of Deep Shadow
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.
flavor_text: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.

name: Elvish Skysweeper
oracle_text: {4}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text: The spires of Ravnica are no different from the tall trees of other planes. The elves navigate and protect them just the same.

name: Faith's Fetters
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

name: Farseek
oracle_text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

name: Fiery Conclusion
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

name: Fists of Ironwood
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
Enchanted creature has trample.
flavor_text: Saprolings add the three and the four to the "one-two punch."

name: Flight of Fancy
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Flight of Fancy enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Enchanted creature has flying.
flavor_text: The view from above is an inspiration to the newly winged.

name: Galvanic Arc
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Galvanic Arc enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target.
Enchanted creature has first strike.

name: Gate Hound
oracle_text: Creatures you control have vigilance as long as Gate Hound is enchanted.
flavor_text:
"Ditri, I leave this checkpoint in your capable teeth."
—Kitov, nightguard patrol

name: Gather Courage
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Gaze of the Gorgon
oracle_text:
({B/G} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.)
Regenerate target creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by it this turn.
flavor_text: Even the dead give way to the mineral gaze of the gorgon.

name: Goblin Fire Fiend
oracle_text:
Haste
Goblin Fire Fiend must be blocked if able.
{R}: Goblin Fire Fiend gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Goblin Spelunkers
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: Chimney sweeps, explorers of abandoned buildings, spire climbers . . . goblin spelunkers have found countless niches within Ravnica's metropolis.

name: Golgari Brownscale
oracle_text:
When Golgari Brownscale is put into your hand from your graveyard, you gain 2 life.
Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Golgari Rot Farm
oracle_text:
Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped.
When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {B}{G}.

name: Golgari Rotwurm
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.
flavor_text: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.

name: Golgari Signet
flavor_text: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

name: Grayscaled Gharial
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: Each tooth carries enough bacteria to kill a person in a day or two. But then, gharials do have 138 teeth.

name: Greater Mossdog
oracle_text: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)
flavor_text: Man's best fungus.

name: Guardian of Vitu-Ghazi
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Vigilance
flavor_text: It stands sentinel to the great City-Tree, home of the Selesnya Conclave.

name: Incite Hysteria
oracle_text: Radiance — Until end of turn, target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain "This creature can't block."
flavor_text:
"The Boros say they want to bring order to Ravnica. Funny then, how well they use chaos."
—Trigori, Azorius senator

name: Induce Paranoia
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If {B} was spent to cast this spell, that spell's controller mills X cards, where X is the spell's mana value.

name: Infectious Host
oracle_text: When Infectious Host dies, target player loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Lost man, dead man, knocking on the door. Cankerman, soreman, knock no more."
—Ravnican children's rhyme

name: Last Gasp
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Allow me a moment to catch your breath."

name: Leave No Trace
oracle_text: Radiance — Destroy target enchantment and each other enchantment that shares a color with it.
flavor_text: The magic of the Boros patrols the streets even when their soldiers do not.

name: Lurking Informant
oracle_text:
({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.)
{2}, {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text: In the undercity, forgetfulness is often encouraged at the point of a blade.

name: Mortipede
oracle_text: {2}{G}: All creatures able to block Mortipede this turn do so.
flavor_text: Mortipede pheromones choke the streets with sickly sweetness, luring the rash and unwary into its waiting jaws.

name: Muddle the Mixture
oracle_text:
Counter target instant or sorcery spell.
Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Necromantic Thirst
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Nightguard Patrol
oracle_text: First strike, vigilance
flavor_text: "The Wojek defend the laws. We defend the people."

name: Ordruun Commando
oracle_text: {W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ordruun Commando this turn.
flavor_text: Thick of muscle, stout of heart, and possessing a burning love of justice and the battlefield, the Ordruun minotaurs are the foundation of the Boros Legion.

name: Peel from Reality
oracle_text: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: When House Dimir's secrets are in danger of exposure, the guild takes drastic measures to cover its tracks.

name: Perplex
oracle_text:
Counter target spell unless its controller discards their hand.
Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Quickchange
oracle_text:
Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Most Ravnicans lead lives of desperate survival. Those who thrive are malleable enough to change with the ever-shifting politics of the guilds.

name: Rain of Embers
oracle_text: Rain of Embers deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.

name: Rally the Righteous
oracle_text: Radiance — Untap target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. Those creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Yuri took up the ragged Boros banner, and his brethren, inspired by the act, followed him back into the fight.

name: Roofstalker Wight
oracle_text: {1}{U}: Roofstalker Wight gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: No heartbeat to hear, no greed to bribe, no fear of death.

name: Sabertooth Alley Cat
oracle_text:
Sabertooth Alley Cat attacks each combat if able.
{1}{R}: Creatures without defender can't block Sabertooth Alley Cat this turn.
flavor_text: It has eight lives' worth of hunger to satisfy.

name: Sadistic Augermage
oracle_text: When Sadistic Augermage dies, each player puts a card from their hand on top of their library.
flavor_text: "Don't worry. I know the drill."

name: Scatter the Seeds
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor_text: From the seeds of faith, great forests grow.

name: Screeching Griffin
oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: Target creature can't block Screeching Griffin this turn.
flavor_text: They were master fishers, but their seas are now the streets and their catch, the goblins that run pell-mell from the screeching in the sky.

name: Seeds of Strength
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Beneath the beauty of light and seed is the might of Vitu-Ghazi.

name: Seismic Spike
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Add {R}{R}.
flavor_text: Natural disasters in Ravnica are largely nullified by the Izzet. Unnatural disasters, on the other hand, happen all the time.

name: Selesnya Evangel
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text: "The clamor of the city drowns all voices. But together we can sing a harmony that will resonate from Ravnica's tallest spires to her deepest wells."

name: Selesnya Sanctuary
oracle_text:
Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.
When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {G}{W}.

name: Selesnya Signet
flavor_text: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

name: Sell-Sword Brute
oracle_text: When Sell-Sword Brute dies, it deals 2 damage to you.
flavor_text: "Killing is easy. Just wrap your hand around the haft, and wrap your enemy around the blade."

name: Sewerdreg
oracle_text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Sacrifice Sewerdreg: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text: They hardly have form, dripping through pipe and grate with the slip and stench of flowing sewage.

name: Shambling Shell
oracle_text:
Sacrifice Shambling Shell: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Shred Memory
oracle_text:
Exile up to four target cards from a single graveyard.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Siege Wurm
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Trample
flavor_text: The Rubblefield was once among the wealthiest districts in Ravnica. All it took was a single wurm to reduce it to ruins.

name: Skyknight Legionnaire
oracle_text: Flying, haste
flavor_text:
"I do not know which gives me more pride: the legions of soldiers marching in thunderous lockstep, or the cry of the skyknights riding their rocs like jagged lightning overhead."
—Razia

name: Smash
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.

name: Snapping Drake
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: The irritable drakes are solitary nesters. Even brooding females barely contain the urge to attack their own young.

name: Sparkmage Apprentice
oracle_text: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Pajik was amazed and pleased at his newfound powers. His pet cat Rivin was slightly less enthusiastic.

name: Stasis Cell
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
{3}{U}: Attach Stasis Cell to target creature.
flavor_text: The Simic created the cells to preserve their experiments. The Azorius put the cells to use on the guilty.

name: Stinkweed Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.
Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, you may mill five cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Stone-Seeder Hierophant
oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, untap Stone-Seeder Hierophant.
{T}: Untap target land.
flavor_text: Her touch brings to bare stone what water and sun bring to rich soil.

name: Strands of Undeath
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Strands of Undeath enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.
{B}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"Why limit yourself to mortal law when you can outlive those who enforce it?"
—Czaric, Orzhov prelate

name: Sundering Vitae
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Centuries of wind, rain, and roots compressed into an instant of destruction: such is the power of Selesnya.

name: Surge of Zeal
oracle_text: Radiance — Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"If only my poxes were as infectious as their zealotry."
—Savra

name: Surveilling Sprite
oracle_text:
Flying
When Surveilling Sprite dies, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: Their natural curiosity, combined with a knack for trespassing, makes sprites excellent spies.

name: Tattered Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}: Regenerate Tattered Drake.
flavor_text:
"Drakes embody the worst of Ravnica: great potential, twisted by selfishness and greed."
—Razia

name: Terraformer
oracle_text: {1}: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.
flavor_text: "This feels a little more like home."

name: Terrarion
oracle_text:
Terrarion enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terrarion: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
When Terrarion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

name: Thoughtpicker Witch
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Look at the top two cards of target opponent's library, then exile one of them.
flavor_text: "Once the brew gets the brains nice and pickled, they're a lot easier to pick through."

name: Thundersong Trumpeter
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
flavor_text:
"Hear that? Those notes mean we've arrived at Sunhome! Let our allies' hearts soar and our enemies' hearts shatter at the sound!"
—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

name: Tidewater Minion
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{4}: Tidewater Minion loses defender until end of turn.
{T}: Untap target permanent.

name: Torpid Moloch
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Sacrifice three lands: Torpid Moloch loses defender until end of turn.
flavor_text: Market hucksters sell molochs for use as watchdogs. Of course, that's all molochs do. Sit around . . . and watch.

name: Transluminant
oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice Transluminant: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: "Forget yourself. Forget your city. Forget your homes, your families, the debts and obligations that hold you to this world."

name: Vedalken Dismisser
oracle_text: When Vedalken Dismisser enters the battlefield, put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"I crept up on him, quiet as a guttermouse. And then suddenly I found myself facedown in a latrine pit behind Tin Street Market."
—Sirislav, Dimir spy

name: Vedalken Entrancer
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.
flavor_text: Their denial reaches far into your future.

name: Veteran Armorer
oracle_text: Other creatures you control get +0/+1.
flavor_text: "Give me a sword and I'll kill a few enemies. But give me a hammer and a fiery forge, and I'll turn the tide of battle."

name: Viashino Fangtail
oracle_text: {T}: Viashino Fangtail deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"When the bony terminus gets too large, it's shed from the tail in coinciding periods of heightened aggression and hunger."
—Simic research notes

name: Viashino Slasher
oracle_text: {R}: Viashino Slasher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Citizens of Ravnica stick to the main streets. Shortcuts may look tempting, but down each alley, dozens of hungry hands await, and screams do not carry into the busy market throng.

name: Votary of the Conclave
oracle_text: {2}{G}: Regenerate Votary of the Conclave.
flavor_text: An ageless order, the votaries receive the gift of rejuvenation from the temple gardens they guard.

name: War-Torch Goblin
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice War-Torch Goblin: It deals 2 damage to target blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"In a town shaped by the subtle machinations and political intrigue of its guilds, it's reassuring to see a goblin waving his torch and screaming about some nonsense or other."
—Agrus Kos

name: Wojek Siren
oracle_text: Radiance — Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It is the call to arms, the call to fury, the call to blood.

name: Woodwraith Strangler
oracle_text: Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Regenerate Woodwraith Strangler.
flavor_text:
"Nothing could be more natural than roots sucking nourishment from the dead."
—Savra

name: Zephyr Spirit
oracle_text: When Zephyr Spirit blocks, return it to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: A spiteful force exists on Ravnica that binds these ghosts to the land of the living but forbids them to touch it.
